widget.label: Ves Product List: Tab by Source and Conditions

parameter.name: product_template
parameter.label: Product Template
parameter.description: Input custom product template file path. Default: Ves_Productlist::widget/bootstrapcarousel/items.phtml

parameter.name: block_template
parameter.label: Module Template
parameter.description: Input custom module template file path. For example: widget/tabs.phtml. Empty for default

parameter.name: enable_animate_tab
parameter.label: Enable Animate Tab
parameter.description: Makes content panels fade out and in when a new tab is clicked.

parameter.name: animation_speed
parameter.label: Animation Speed
parameter.description: Controls the speed of the fading effect. Value: "slow", "normal", "fast", integer in milliseconds ("normal")

parameter.name: collapsible
parameter.label: Collapsible
parameter.description: Makes panels collapse and un-collapse if active tab is clicked repeatedly.

parameter.name: cycle
parameter.label: Cycle
parameter.description: Turns on automatic cycling through tabs, with the specified cycling interval in milliseconds. Default value: false, integer in milliseconds

parameter.name: default_tab
parameter.label: Defaut Tab Position
parameter.description: Enter the position of default tab. Default is the first tab

parameter.name: transition_in
parameter.label: Transition In
parameter.description: The jQuery effect used to show the target panel when a tab is selected.

parameter.name: transition_in_easing
parameter.label: Transition In Easing
parameter.description: The jQuery easing speed for the transitionIn animation. May also be used with custom easing plugins, such as provided by the jquery easing plugin.

parameter.name: transition_out
parameter.label: Transition Out
parameter.description: The jQuery effect used to hide the visible panel when a tab is selected.

parameter.name: transition_out_easing
parameter.label: Transition Out Easing
parameter.description: The jQuery easing speed for the transitionOut animation. May also be used with custom easing plugins, such as provided by the jquery easing plugin. Default is swing

parameter.name: short_max_char
parameter.label: Description Character Limit
parameter.description: Empty to show all short description

parameter.name: aspect_ratio
parameter.label: Aspect Ratio
parameter.description: If set to Yes, it will keep aspect ratio of the product image (height of the image will be calculated automatically based on width). If set to No, Magento will automatically transform each image into square. If the original image was rectangular, the empty space at the sides will be filled with white color.

parameter.name: alt_image
parameter.label: Alternative Image
parameter.description: Set Show Image: Enable

parameter.name: lg_column_item
parameter.label: Number Column on Large Desktop
parameter.description: Large devices Desktops (≥1200px)

parameter.name: md_column_item
parameter.label: Number Column on Desktop
parameter.description: Medium devices Desktops (≥992px)

parameter.name: sm_column_item
parameter.label: Number Column on Tablets
parameter.description: Small devices Tablets (≥768px)

parameter.name: xs_column_item
parameter.label: Number Column on Phones
parameter.description: Extra small devices Phones (<768px)

parameter.name: number_item_percolumn
parameter.label: Number of Item per Column
parameter.description: Multiple Row

parameter.name: custom_item_height
parameter.label: Custom Height
parameter.description: Unit: pixel. Empty to display normally

parameter.name: large_max_items
parameter.label: Number Columns On Page (Large display)
parameter.description: Show number items when screen size 1200px and up

parameter.name: large_items
parameter.label: Number Columns On Page
parameter.description: Show number items when screen size between 1199px and 980px

parameter.name: portrait_items
parameter.label: Number Columns On Page (Portrait tablets)
parameter.description: Show number items when screen size between 979px and 769px

parameter.name: tablet_items
parameter.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones to tablets)
parameter.description: Show number items when screen size between 768px and 641px

parameter.name: tablet_small_items
parameter.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones to Small tablets)
parameter.description: Show number items when screen size between 640px and 480px

parameter.name: mobile_items
parameter.label: Number Columns On Page (Phones)
parameter.description: Show number items when screen size bellow 480px

parameter.name: loop
parameter.label: Loop
parameter.description: Infinity loop. Duplicate last and first items to get loop illusion.
